author: Special Correspondent
text:
Members of the Tamil Nadu Vivasayigal Sangam showing their affected crop in Tiruchi on Monday— PHOTO: A. MURALITHARAN

A section of farmers from Tiruverambur area, on Monday, have sought immediate payment of compensation to the ‘samba’ paddy cultivators who have lost their crop following poor quality seeds supplied to them.

In a petition to District Collector K.S. Palanisamy, farmers led by Ayilai Siva Suriyan, District Secretary of the Tamil Nadu Vivasayigal Sangam, said the problem was more acute on the fields where farmers had sown seeds got from a few private depots in the Tiruverambur area.

Submitting a sample of the damaged paddy, he said farmers of Vengur, Natarajapuram, Murukkoor, and Koothaipar had borne the brunt.
title: Quality of seeds poor, say farmers
